tr.td: 85th meeting between Hanover & Franklin. Hanover leads series 42-39-3.
59th-annual Victory Bell game. Hanover leads Bell series 35-23.
Franklin has won past 10 Victory Bell games.
Hanover wins coin toss and will receive the opening kick
